en.content: You hear something from the road behind you. It is a dull clunk—perhaps a dead branch falling. You pause, but the sound does not repeat. You retrace a few paces and look down the road. There is nothing to see.

text.content: You may check-mark the small box beside the Listen skill.

zh.content: 你听到身后的路上传来什么声音。是沉闷的喀嚓声——可能是枯枝坠落的声音。你停下脚步，但声音并没有再次响起。你往回走了几步，沿路望去，但什么也看不到。

text.content: 你可以在「聆听」技能左边的小方框里打勾。
